title: Describe the most amazing play you've ever seen in game
body:
This was a 3 player combo.
Cho'gath top
Lee sin jungle
Yasuo mid

At around lvl 14, we grouped for teamfights at the outer mid lane turret. Their enemy jinx was out of position, and lee sin was coming from the enemy jungle, q'd to her and ulted her diagonally towards the river bushes, cho, seeing this q'd where jinx was landing and knocked her up. Yasuo was just getting to mid's outer turret and ulted off of cho's Q. 
The rest is easy to guess.

So, GD, share your stories of awe and amazement :)
